name: Captan America (GIVEAWAY ) pig#025
description:
GIVEAWAY
25th work of art from the Pig Collection
The pig is a symbol of wealth and fertility, so I chose the pig as the representative of this collection (in the first stage). In this collection, I have depicted pigs in the form of characters, each of which represents the personality, cortex and symbol of a specific concept so that I can use these symbols and concepts in the life of modern man.
